techmeme.title: Meta unveils $399+ Oakley smart glasses with same features as Ray-Ban glasses but with 3K video recording, IPX4 water resistance, and double the battery life (Alex Heath/The Verge)
Sources: Masayoshi Son is pitching a Shenzhen-like $1T AI and robotics manufacturing hub in Arizona, codenamed Project Crystal Land, in partnership with TSMC (Bloomberg)
Sources: Foxconn and Nvidia are in talks to deploy humanoid robots at a new Foxconn factory in Houston by Q1 2026 to produce Nvidia AI servers (Wen-Yee Lee/Reuters)
South Korea's SK Group and AWS will invest ~$5.1B including $4B from AWS to build a 100 MW AI data center in Ulsan by 2029, and plan to expand capacity to 1 GW (Reuters)
Israeli authorities urge citizens to turn off home cameras, and say Iran is tapping into security cameras in Israel to gather real-time intelligence for attacks (Marissa Newman/Bloomberg)
